thread.title: Happy Customer
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by Happy Customer

author: Happy Customer
title: Happy Customer
text: I like Mavis. I've been to them before for tires. My car needed inspection and an oil change. I had been going to my dealer but it's a haul to get there and takes forever! I was going to go up Rt. 9 (they're great, too) but spotted Mavis in Hopewell Jct. Went right in and made an appointment. They were very accommodating. Got there at 8 and was out the door 45 minutes later. Prices were competitive and they didn't try to pressure me into a lot of other things. This will be my go to place for auto maintenance!
